setCardNumber(int) - Method in interface Model.Cards.Card
transformer: sets the number of the card, the number of the card will basically be the number of the row of the card in the String[][] mailCards of the PayDayCards class
Precondition: for mail Cards 0<=number<=47 and for deal cards 0<=number<19
Postcondition: The number has changed
setCardNumber(int) - Method in class Model.Cards.DealCard
transformer: sets the number of the card, the number of the card will basically be the number of the row of the card in the String[][] mailCards of the PayDayCards class
Precondition: for deal cards 0<=number<19
Postcondition: The number has changed
setCardNumber(int) - Method in class Model.Cards.MessageCard
transformer: sets the number of the card, the number of the card will basically be the number of the row of the card in the String[][] mailCards of the PayDayCards class
Precondition: for mail Cards 0<=number<=47
Postcondition: The number has changed
setCurrentTile(Tile) - Method in class Model.Player
transformer: moves the player to a new tile
precondition: the tile is not null
postcondition: the currentTile of the player has changed the tile of the parameter
setCurrentTile(Tile) - Method in interface Model.PlayerADT
transformer: moves the player to a new tile
precondition: the tile is not null
postcondition: the currentTile of the player has changed the tile of the parameter
setInfo(String[]) - Method in interface Model.Cards.Card
transformer: sets the String[] info of the card, which contains the title, message, type and image and is provided by the PayDayCards class
Postcondition: The message has changed

transformer: sets the String[] info of the card, which contains the title, message, type and image and is provided by the PayDayCards class
Precondition: info is not null and contains all the necessary data for the card
Postcondition: The message has changed

transformer: sets the location of the tile (or null is the tile does not have a location)

transformer: sets the order number of the tile
Precondition: the orderNumber must be between 0 and 32
Postcondition: the order number has changed

shuffleDeck() - Method in class Model.Cards.CardDeck
Transformer: Shuffles the deck
Precondition: The deck is not empty
Postcondition: The order of the cards in the array list is random
startMenuPopup() - Static method in class View.GraphicUI
Opens a dialog where the user is asked to select the months of the game (1,2 or 3)
StartTile - Class in Model.Tiles
Subclass of Tile, is this subclass the tileAction method is empty as the starting tile has no action
StartTile() - Constructor for class Model.Tiles.StartTile
constructor: Constructs a new DealTile with the given parameters orderNumber, imagePath and numberOfMessageCards
postcondition: Creates and initializes a DealTile with the given orderNumber and imagePath
sundayMatch() - Method in class Controller.Controller
Transformer: The sunday match gui popup window is called and if the player plays and wins money is added, if he loses money is subtracted and if he doesn't play nothing happens
postcondition: The sundayPopUp of the gui has been called and the money has been added or subtracted from the player
sundayPopUp(Dice) - Method in class View.GraphicUI
The player selects a team that he wants to bid on 500$, if his guess was correct 1 is returned, if it was wrong 2 is returned and if he didn't bid 0 is returned
sweepstakes() - Method in class Controller.Controller
Transformer: The sweepstakes gui popup window is called and the money that the player wins is added to his money
postcondition: The sweepstakesPopUp of the gui has been called and the money has been added to the player
sweepstakesPopUp(Dice) - Method in class View.GraphicUI
Called when a player arrives at a sweeptakes tile.
SweepTakesTile - Class in Model.Tiles
Subclass of Tile, the only difference from Tile is the action method that performs the necessary actions of each round
SweepTakesTile() - Constructor for class Model.Tiles.SweepTakesTile
constructor: Constructs a new SweepTakesTile with the given parameters orderNumber and imagePath
postcondition: Creates and initializes a SweepTakesTile with the given orderNumber and imagePath
